attributes.action: legislate to stop over pricing by service stations in uk
attributes.additional_details:
this pricing cartel is unfair and exploitative to anyone travelling in this country . 
government needs to intervene to cease this unjust situation .
attributes.background: stop the unfair pricing cartel on uk motorways

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the price of motor fuel, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, we could accept a petition calling on the Government to set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
